uk.co.ordnancesurvey.android.maps

Class BitmapDescriptorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.ordnancesurvey.android.maps.BitmapDescriptorFactory

  • public final class BitmapDescriptorFactory
extends Object
    Used to create a definition of an image, used for marker icons.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultMarker

        public static BitmapDescriptor defaultMarker()
        Creates a bitmap descriptor that refers to the default marker image.

      • defaultMarker

        public static BitmapDescriptor defaultMarker(float hue)
        Creates a bitmap descriptor that refers to a colorization of the default marker image. For convenience, there is a predefined set of hue values. See example HUE_YELLOW.
        Parameters:
        hue - The hue of the marker which must be in the range 0 <= hue < 360
        Returns:
        a bitmap descriptor

      • fromAsset

        public static BitmapDescriptor fromAsset(String assetName)
        Creates a BitmapDescriptor using the name of an image in the assets directory.
        Parameters:
        assetName - The name of an image in the assets directory.
        Returns:
        the BitmapDescriptor that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.

      • fromBitmap

        public static BitmapDescriptor fromBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
        Creates a bitmap descriptor from a given image.

      • fromFile

        public static BitmapDescriptor fromFile(String fileName)
        Creates a BitmapDescriptor using the name of an image file located in the internal storage. In particular, this calls Context.openFileInput(String).
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the image file.
        Returns:
        the BitmapDescriptor that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.

      • fromPath

        public static BitmapDescriptor fromPath(String path)
        Creates a BitmapDescriptor from an absolute file path.
        Parameters:
        path - The absolute path of the image.
        Returns:
        the BitmapDescriptor that was loaded from the absolute path or null if failed to load.

      • fromResource

        public static BitmapDescriptor fromResource(int resourceId)
        Creates a BitmapDescriptor using the resource id of an image.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The resource id of an image.
        Returns:
        the BitmapDescriptor that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.
